description: This file demonstrates the usage of LangDBEmbedder to generate embeddings and initialize an AgentKnowledge object with a PgVector database connection.

classes.name: AgentKnowledge
classes.description: Represents an agent with a knowledge base, initialized with a vector database and number of documents.

classes.name: LangDBEmbedder
classes.description: Embeds text using a language database.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: Represents a vector database connection using PostgreSQL with pgvector extension.

methods.name: get_embedding
methods.description: Generates embeddings for a given text input.
